columns.label: No. of Beneficiary Have Bank Account

name: Beneficiaries have Bank
query:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN existing_bank_account = 'No' THEN 'No. of beneficiaries who don''t have a bank account'
        ELSE 'No. of beneficiaries who have a bank account'
    END AS has_bank_account,
    COUNT(name) AS beneficiary_count
FROM tabBeneficiary
WHERE (registration_date >= %(start_date)s AND registration_date <= %(end_date)s)
   OR ('start_date' IS NULL OR 'end_date' IS NULL)
GROUP BY
    CASE
        WHEN existing_bank_account = 'No' THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END;
